sentences.sentence: Nowhere is the triumph of the tsars more evident than in the wicked world of drugs.
sentences.translation: “沙皇”取胜再没有比在缺德的药品界表现得更为明显了。

sentences.sentence: Driven underground for 75 years, the faith of the Russian tsars now enjoys favored status.
sentences.translation: 75年来，人们对俄罗斯沙皇的信仰转入地下，如今这个信仰享受到最优待地位。

sentences.sentence: Republican Americans cannot get enough tsars.
sentences.translation: 奉行共和主义的美国人还没拥有足够多的沙皇。
